title: The Opa Legacy
description: The secrets we keep. Just when you think you know all about somebody, especially familyâ€¦ Guess again. Willem Albert Van Komen the quiet and loving Opa of the very large Van Komen clan, held many secrets about his past. The trials of his military service to the West indies almost destroyed him, but his sense of family gave him the hope and desire get back home. He never immigrated from the Netherlands to the USA with his many descendants stating he had to stay with his beloved wife, Henderkien. The few tidbits he divulged in his later life have been explored, researched and now shared with all of you in this adventure filled fictionalized history by Janie Van Komen available on Smashwords.com.
author: Janie Van Komen
